messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] hey
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kyle, If you re in school, you might really enjoy Grace Llewelyn s book, Guerilla Learning: How to Give Your Kids a Real Education With or Without School.
messages.messageBody:
Hi Kyle,

If you're in school, you might really enjoy Grace Llewelyn's book,
"Guerilla Learning: How to Give Your Kids a Real Education With or
Without School." She also wrote "The Teenage Liberation Handbook."

-pam

On Sep 30, 2007, at 2:03 PM, Kyle Brooks wrote:

> though i'm not an unschooler (i'm just a 16 year old kid), i have
> learned a lot about myself and what parents should do to their kids
> (i might have kids in the future) from http://joyfullyrejoycing.com/ -
> thanks a lot!

messages.subject: hey
messages.msgSnippet: hey everyone, though i m not an unschooler (i m just a 16 year old kid), i have learned a lot   about myself and what parents should do to their kids (i might
messages.messageBody:
hey everyone,

though i'm not an unschooler (i'm just a 16 year old kid), i have
learned a lot about myself and what parents should do to their kids
(i might have kids in the future) from http://joyfullyrejoycing.com/ -
thanks a lot!

- kyle
